meanings.definition: A painting, drawing, photograph, or engraving of a person.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed beautiful portraits of famous people.
meanings.sent2: She hung family portraits on the living room wall.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child drew silly portraits of the family dog.
meanings.sent4: Her words painted vivid portraits of the characters in the book.
meanings.sent5: The artist's portraits captured the essence of each subject perfectly.

meanings.definition: A verbal description or representation of a person.
meanings.sent1: The writer's detailed portraits of characters brought the story to life.
meanings.sent2: He gave a moving portrait of his grandmother during the speech.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's hilarious portrait of the president had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her words painted vivid portraits of the characters in the book.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's portrait of the student was both accurate and touching.
